content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SUBJID
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value:
        - STUDYID
Core:
  Id: CORE-000186
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error if SUBJID is not unique
Outcome:
  Message: SUBJID is not unique within study
  Output Variables:
    - SUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Study
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0150
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Subject identifier, which must be unique within the
                  study.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Trigger error if SUBJID is not unique

Outcome.Message: SUBJID is not unique within study

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Subject identifier, which must be unique within the study.
